benchmark_details.name: MDVP-Bench
benchmark_details.overview: MDVP-Bench is a challenging benchmark designed to evaluate a modelâ€™s ability to understand visual prompting instructions, encompassing a variety of tasks including point-level and region-level captioning, inter-relationship analysis, and complex reasoning.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a solid foundation for future research in the field of visual prompting and multimodal models.

data.source: MDVP-Instruct-Data, curated from existing datasets with additional data generated using GPT-4V.
data.annotation: Annotated using a combination of existing datasets and GPT-4V generated content.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the performance scores in tasks such as point-level and region-level captioning.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better model performance when understanding and generating responses to visual prompting instructions.
methodology.validation: Evaluation against state-of-the-art models in various visual prompting tasks.
